replies.msg: 高爺爺出咗statement話唔會賣

KSE statement:

In recent days we have noted media speculation regarding a potential takeover bid for Arsenal Football Club.

We remain 100% committed to Arsenal and are not selling any stake in the Club. We have not received any offer and we will not entertain any offer.

Our ambition for Arsenal remains to compete to win the biggest trophies in the game and our focus remains on improving our competitiveness on the pitch to achieve this.

Stan Kroenke and Josh Kroenke

Kroenke, Sports & Entertainment

BREAKING: Arsenal director Josh Kroenke has told staff at the club today that KSE will not entertain any offers to sell Arsenal during an internal call this afternoon. He also stated they will make transfer funds available this summer to help the team compete for trophies. [ESPN]

KSE’s statement:
In recent days we have noted media speculation regarding a potential takeover bid for Arsenal Football Club.
We remain 100% committed to Arsenal and are not selling any stake in the Club.
We have not received any offer and we will not entertain any offer.

Our ambition for Arsenal remains to compete to win the biggest trophies in the game and our focus remains on improving our competitiveness on the pitch to achieve this.

Stan Kroenke and Josh Kroenke.

quote.msg: BREAKING: Arsenal director Josh Kroenke has told staff at the club today that KSE will not entertain any offers to sell Arsenal during an internal call this afternoon. He also stated they will make transfer funds available this summer to help the team compete for trophies. [ESPN]

replies.msg:
The Athletic:

Speaking to The Athletic on Monday, a financier who has helped several entrepreneurs buy and sell sports teams said he “can’t imagine” a circumstance that would see the Kroenkes, or any of the other American owners of the Super League clubs, sell up.

This was the message from the club, too, with one source dismissing the idea that the Kroenkes would be bounced into a sale as “a joke”.

“Kroenke won’t sell,” says Paul Conway, the American owner of Championship side Barnsley. “He married into massive wealth with the Walton family and wants to pass Arsenal to his children.”

To flesh out this potted family history, property developer Kroenke married Ann Walton in 1974. Twenty-one years later, she inherited her father’s stake in American retail giant Walmart. His wealth plus hers is north of £12 billion.

《KSE 發表聲明》：“我們仍然100%忠實於阿仙奴，不會出售俱樂部的任何股份。我們並未收到任何報價，也不會對任何報價感興趣。我們的雄心壯志在於帶領阿仙奴去贏得最頂級的獎杯，目前我們正專注於提升球隊的競爭力。”

衛報 :

Daniel Ek 對這份聲明不為所動，他將利用名宿們的影響力和球迷最近發起的 “Kroenke Out” 的聲勢來測試高安基繼續掌控阿仙奴的決心。Ek 將於今天接受媒體的訪問，首次公開闡述他的收購計劃並展望俱樂部未來的發展。據悉，一份正式的收購報價最早將會於下周傳送到高安基的手裡。

阿仙奴名宿賓特拿又遇到麻煩了，他將面臨五項無牌駕駛指控和兩項超速指控，他價值17.6萬英鎊的保時捷可能會被沒收。

N賓目前效力於丹麥第四級別球隊 Tarnby FF，這支球隊目前在九支球隊中排名第七。
